Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2018 by Former State and Federal Prosecutors to admit Robert L. Walker Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of July 2018."
